name: Jay and Silent Bob: Chronic Blunt Punch
name_original: Jay and Silent Bob: Chronic Blunt Punch
description: Jay and Silent Bob: Chronic Blunt Punch is a colorful side-scrolling tag-team beat-em-up where players swap back and forth between our heroes on the fly or perform special moves simultaneously with a friend. Our heroes embark on an epic adventure from the humble corners where they ply their trade to the gates of hell itself.
